import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent { formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; onSubmit() { console.log('Form submitted:', this.formData); // Add form submission logic here this.formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; } }
